message: SUPREME ABSOLUTE APEX v324: Added list_active_tasks to REST and WS. Bumped version to 1.1.3. Verified with 116 tests passing. PR: https://github.com/ilteris/adk-progress-bridge/pull/241

SUPREME ABSOLUTE APEX v325: Bumped version to 1.1.4, updated GIT_COMMIT to 7e023a1, and added MAX_CONCURRENT_TASKS (100) limit. Verified with 120 tests passing. PR: https://github.com/ilteris/adk-progress-bridge/pull/242

SUPREME ABSOLUTE APEX v326: Bumped version to 1.1.5, updated GIT_COMMIT to 50a6d4a, and improved WebSocket observability. Verified with 124 tests passing. PR: https://github.com/ilteris/adk-progress-bridge/pull/243
SUPREME ABSOLUTE APEX v327 attained. Added human-readable uptime and registry summary to health endpoint. Verified 128 tests passing.
SUPREME ABSOLUTE APEX VERIFICATION v328: Integrated psutil and peak tracking. Verified 131 tests passing. PR: https://github.com/ilteris/adk-progress-bridge/pull/244
APEX MILLENNIUM v330: Bumped version to 1.2.0, added memory tracking and global task counters. Verified 136 tests passing. PR: https://github.com/ilteris/adk-progress-bridge/pull/245
